course_description: The subject of this course is the neighbors of ancient Israel: the Philistines, Phoenicians, Ammonites, Moabites, Edomites, Arameans, and many others. These peoples were in close contact with ancient Israel and influenced its history, culture, economy, etc. We will study the cultures and histories of these peoples as they appear in biblical and extrabiblical texts, and as they are reflected in the archaeological remains uncovered in recent excavations.
sections: Class Nbr: 5950, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1-4p, Instructor: C. Cornell, Status: Open
